mapper.select: select sb.story_board_id, sb.mystory_name, sb.mystory_content, sb.mystory_date, sb.read_date, sb.love_count, u.user_id, u.user_nickname, bi.book_id, bi.book_name, bi.book_author, bi.book_publisher, bi.book_isbn from mystory_board sb JOIN users u ON sb.user_id = u.user_id JOIN book_information bi ON sb.book_id = bi.book_id

select sb.story_board_id, sb.mystory_name, sb.mystory_content, sb.mystory_date, sb.read_date, sb.love_count, u.user_id, u.user_nickname, bi.book_id, bi.book_name, bi.book_author, bi.book_publisher, bi.book_isbn from mystory_board sb JOIN users u ON sb.user_id = u.user_id JOIN book_information bi ON sb.book_id = bi.book_id where story_board_id = #{story_board_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mystory_board (mystory_type_id, mystory_name, mystory_content, user_id, book_id) VALUES (#{mystory_type_id}, #{mystory_name}, #{mystory_content}, #{user_id}, #{book_id});

insert into book_information (book_image, book_name, book_author, book_price, book_publisher, book_publication_date, book_isbn) values (#{book_image}, #{book_name}, #{book_author}, #{book_price}, #{book_publisher}, #{book_publication_date}, #{book_isbn})
